name: BNV
description: BNV is creating a full-stack ecosystem for the global fashion industry, enabling designers and businesses to be both profitable and sustainable with the native ecosystem token fa$h. The full-stack ecosystem comprises of 5 layers 1. The community layer: Connecting Web3/Crypto/Gaming with the global fashion community 2. The product layer: ME:ID, ME:AI and The Vending Machine collectively enables co-creation and value creation between consumers and brands 3. The value layer: An economy powered by fa$h and 3D asset creation powered by BNV Protocol 4. The funding layer: Ecosystem fund and The Green Lane initiative 5. The governance layer: BNV Foundation and BNV DAO
